column3:
The camera zooms out from inside the well. 
We are back at Bumpkin Village with the Herd.
The Herd has just watched Trusty fall down the well.
column7: KAMERAAD!!!!

column4: Honradase? Honradase? Si us p-p-plau no ens abandonis!
column6: Trusty? Trusty!? P-p-please don't leave us!
column7: (Trusty Ass)? (Trusty Ass)? L-laat ons nu n-niet achter!
GODVER! Het Protest valt uiteen!
*KUCH*

column4: El Ramat cada cop és més petit!
column7: De Kudde blijft krimpen!

column3: Soft should be opposite of Hard's name if possible
column4: En Vellase i l'Honradase no tenien fusta de líder. Eren massa tous.
column6: Old Ass and Trusty Ass were not cut out for the role of leader. They were too soft.
column7: (Old Ass) en (Trusty Ass) waren niet uitgeknipt voor het leiderschap. Ze zijn te zacht.

column4: Estàs insultant els nostres Camarades! Només jo puc insultar els nostres Camarades!
column6: You're insulting our Comrades! Only I get to insult our Comrades!
column7: Je beledigt onze Kameraden! Enkel ik beledig onze Kameraden!
Pardon.
*snuf snuf* Is er d-dan een p-plan B?

column4: És clar que tenim un Pla C!
column6: Of course there's a Plan C!
column7: Natuurlijk is er een Plan B!

column4: Alto. Qui ha dit que siguis el LÍDER?
column6: Stop. Who made YOU the leader?
column7: Stop. Sinds wanneer ben JIJ de baas?

column4: Us he de dir una cosa.
column7: Ik heb wat te zeggen.

column4: Fortalase, ara és hora d'actuar, no de debatre.
column6: It's time for action, not debate, Hard Ass.
column7: Het is tijd voor daden, geen woorden, (Hard Ass).

column6: I do not take orders from you.
column7: Ik pak van jou geen bevelen aan.
*KUCH KUCH*

column3: "Let'er RIP" means "Go for it" or "Kick her Ass Hard Ass", or "Don't hold back, Hard Ass"
column7: Laat u gaan, hè, (Hard Ass)!
{vpunch=100,0.75}HEY! LUISTEREN!!!

column4: Està tot tan sec que el foc es propaga cada cop més ràpid.
column6: The fire's accelerating on the dry ground.
column7: Het vuur verspreidt zich over de droge grond.

column4: El vent empeny les flames colossals cap a l'oest! Arribaran a la Granja d'aquí a no res—
column6: The enormous flames are spreading west! They'll reach the Farm in no time—
column7: De gigantische vlammen bewegen zich naar het westen! Niet lang meer tot ze bij de Boerderij-
OESJE! Toch niet de Boerderij!

column4: I els altres! No quedarà dingú si no arribem a temps!
column6: And the others! They'll be in a mighty pickle if we don't git there in time!
column7: En d'anderen! Ze zullen ze schoon gesjareld zijn als we daar niet op tijd zijn, héé!
PLAN C!

column4: U, algú torna corrents a la Granja per avisar els altres.
column6: ONE, someone races back to the Farm to warn the others.
column7: ÉÉN, iemand moet naar de Boerderij crossen om de rest te waarschuwen.

column4: DOS, algú altre treu els Humans dels edificis en flames.
column6: TWO, someone else pulls the Humans out of the burning buildings.
column7: TWEE, iemand anders moet de Mensen uit de brandhaard sleuren.

column4: TRES, la resta anem a buscar aigua al riu, apaguem el foc, convencem els Humans perquè abandonin les Màquines...
column6: THREE, the rest of us get water from the river, put out the fire, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...
column7: DRIE, de rest  moet water uit de rivier scheppen, het vuur blussen en de Mensen overtuigen om de Machines te laten...
EN ONZE JOBS TERUG TE GEVEN!
Poepsimpel.
M-maar wat d-dan met (Trusty Ass)?

column4: En Coixase s'hauria de quedar aquí i cantar la Cançó de l'Ascensió per a l'Honradase.
column6: Slow Ass should stay behind and sing the Song of Ascension for Trusty.
column7: (Slow AsS) moet achterblijven en het ezelenhemelvaartszangderzielen aan Trusty voorbrengen.

column4: Està bé. De totes maneres, en Coixase és un pes mort.
column6: Fine. Slow Ass is dead weight anyways.
column7: Oké dan. (Slow Ass) is toch maar oponthoud.

column4: Qui tornarà corrents a la Granja?
column6: Who's going to run back to the Farm?
column7: Wie loopt er terug naar de Boerderij?

column4: Les cuixes de la Bellase poden fer aquest ricorregut en menys de dos minuts. Iiihà!
column6: Nice Ass's fine legs can do that run in less than two minutes! Yeehaw!
column7: (Nice Ass) d'r lange benen kunnen da' in minder dan twee minuten! Da'k ik het ge'zeid 'hee.

column4: Total! Faria el que fos per salvar la Granja!
column6: Heck, I'd do anything to save our Farm!
column7: Shit. Ik zou alles doen om onze Boerderij te redden!
Is er bezwaar, (Hard Ass)?
...neen.

column3: Nice starts running back to the Farm
column4: Molt bé. Galopa ràpid com el vent, Bellase! I no m'esguerris el Pla.
column6: Good. Run like the wind Nice Ass! And don't ruin my Plan.
column7: Mooi. Je moest er al zijn, (Nice Ass)! En verbrod mijn Plan niet.

column3: If Nice Ass touches fire in the village.
column7: Blijf van het vuur weg!

column3: If Nice Ass tries to talk to the Herd.
column7: Snel!

column3: If Nice Ass goes the wrong way.
column4: Jesús, el fum em deu estar afectant. Per aquí no es va a la Granja.
column6: Golly, the smoke must be getting to me. This isn't the way to the Farm at all.
column7: Jongens toch, de rook moet in mijn systeem zitten. Er is geen enkele weg naar de Boerderij.

column3: If Nice Ass goes the wrong way.
column4: Jesús, el fum em deu estar afectant. Per aquí no es va a la Granja.
column6: Golly, the smoke must be getting to me. This isn't the way to the Farm at all.
column7: Oesje, de rook is te dik. Er is geen enkele weg naar de Boerderij.

column3: Nice arrives at the bridge over the river.
column4: Jesús, sembla que el pont està frenant el foc.
column6: Golly, looks like the bridge is slowing the fire down.
column7: Oesje, de rook is te dik. Er is geen enkele weg naar de Boerderij.

column4: Tristase! Tossudase! Rudase! He vingut a buscar-vos!
column6: Sad Ass! Sturdy Ass! Bad Ass! I'm coming for you!
column7: Oesje, de brug lijkt het vuur tegen te houden.

column3: Nice arrives at the Farm (ie. does not burn out from hitting too much fire) and is met by Bad Ass
column6: What the fuck did you all do?
column7: (Sad Ass)! (Sturdy Ass)! (Bad Ass)! Ik kom eraan!

column4: Pensava que volíeu recuperar la feina, no rostir-ho tot.
column6: I thought you were trying to get your jobs back, not burn everything to the ground.
column7: Wat hebben jullie hier godverdomme liggen doen?

column4: Vaig a buscar en Tristase i la Tossudase i els porto al riu.
column6: I'll find Sad Ass and Sturdy Ass and take them to the river.
column7: Ik dacht dat jullie jullie jobs terug wouden pakken in plaats van alles plat te branden.

column4: Tu troba la manera d'aturar el foc i salva la Granja.
column6: You find a way to stop the fire and save the Farm.
column7: Ik zal (Sad Ass) en (Sturdy Ass) naar de rivier brengen.

column3: If Nice hits too much fire in A1, she blacks out and is awakened by Bad Ass.
column7: Opstaan!

column4: T'havies desmaiat al mig del camí. T'he hagut d'arrossegar fins aquí.
column6: I found you passed out on the road and had to drag you back here.
column7: Ik vond u buitenwesten naast de weg en moest u naar hier sleuren.

column4: Pensava que volíeu recuperar la feina, no rostir-ho tot.
column6: I thought you were trying to get your jobs back, not burn everything to the ground.
column7: Ik dacht dat jullie probeerden jullie jobs terug te pakken, niet de boel platbranden.

column4: No puc contenir més el foc.
column6: I can't keep the fire back any longer.
column7: Ik kon het vuur niet langer tegenhouden.
De brug is compleet verloren

column4: Vaig a buscar en Tristase i la Tossudase i els porto al riu.
column6: I'll find Sad Ass and Sturdy Ass and take them to the river.
column7: Ik zoek (Sad Ass) en (Sturdy Ass) en breng ze naar de rivier.

column4: Tu troba la manera d'aturar el foc i salva la Granja.
column6: You find a way to stop the fire and save the Farm.
column7: Zoek een manier om dat vuur te blussen en de Boerderij te redden.

column3:
Continuing from the moment after Nice Ass ran to the Farm.
The Herd negotiates how to save the Humans.

column4: Qui entrarà a les cases en flames per salvar els Humans?
column6: Who's going to run into the burning houses to save the Humans?

column4: No cardis, està tot massa EIXUT, no me'n sortiria.
column6: It's too DAMN DRY, I'd never make it.

column4: Vols ficar la vostra única GRAN ESTRATEGA en un INCENDI?! Estàs de conya?
column6: You want to send your ACE STRATEGIST into a FIRE?! You gotta be joking!

column3: Smart Ass looks in all directions.
column4: Escolteu bé. Si no salvem els humans, qui ens portarà el Fenc?
column6: Listen. If we don't save the Humans, who will bring us our Hay?

column4: Qui ens rascarà l'interior de les orelles?
column6: Who will scratch the inside of our ears?

column4: Qui ens donarà medicaments quan estiguem malalts?
column6: Who will give us medicine when we're ill?

column4: Qui ens traurà la merda del jaç?
column6: Who will clean the shit out of our beds?
Who will GIVE US OUR JOBS BACK?

column4: Genial, estem llestos per seguir el PLA C!
column6: Okay, we're all set for Plan C!

column4: U, la Bellase salva la Granja.
column6: ONE, Nice Ass saves the Farm.

column4: DOS, en Fortalase salva els Humans.
column6: TWO, Hard Ass saves the Humans.

column4: TRES, la resta porta aigua del riu, apaga el foc, convenç els Humans perquè abandonin les Màquines...
column6: THREE, the rest of us get water from the river, put out the fire, convince the Humans to give up their Machines...

column4: I jo c-c-cantaré la C-c-cançó de l'Ascensió p-per a l'Honradase.
column6: And I'll sing the Song of Ascension for Trusty.

column3: The other donkeys run off to fetch water

column4: He passat per coses pitjors que un edifici en flames.
column6: I've been through worse than a burning building.

column6: Hey! Over here! Under the bookcase!

column4: Agafa la galleda i apaga el foc abans que em cremi!
column6: Get that bucket of water over there and stop this fire from burning me!

column3: Hard Ass has a traumatic flash back of seeing a Miner be crushed during a cave in.

column4: Se suposa que els Animals heu de fer el que diem els Humans!
column6: Animals are supposed to do what Humans say!

column4: L'Àvia sempre ha dit que els burros sou INÚTILS!
column6: Grandma always said donkeys were WORTHLESS!

column4: Segur que ni tan sols teniu ÀNIMA!
column6: I bet you don't even have a SOUL!

column3: The camera fades up from black and we see Nice Ass with her plow, just outside the Fannyside Farm.
column4: El Ramat compta amb mi! Vatua l'olla, si això és pel que m'he estat preparant!
column6: The Herd is counting on me! Yuppers, this is what I've been training for!

column3: Nice Ass begins to plow a fire line, cutting off the fire.
column4: Si llauro el camp com si m'hi anés la vida podré tallar el foc i salvar la nostra estimada Granja!
column6: If I plow like I've never plowed before, I can cut the fire off and save our beautiful Farm!

column3: Nice Ass succeeds with the first line of defense.
A fire ball flies on the wind and ignites a tree.

column4: Me càsum! S'està propagant al bosc!
column6: Jeepers! It's spreading across the Forest!

column4: Ai las! Perdrem el camp sencer!
column6: Yikes! We're going to lose the whole field!

column3: Nice Ass plows west to attempt saving the Farm.
column4: Si evito que el foc passi del centre, encara podré salvar la Meitat Nord de la Granja.
column6: If I cut the fire off at the centre, I can still save the North Half of the Farm.

column3: Nice Ass makes it close to the Outhouse on the Farm and hears something.

column4: He d'arribar a la Comuna abans que sigui massa tard!
column6: I've got to make it to the Outhouse before it's too late!

column3: If Nice Ass hits too much fire.

column4: Però i si ho he fet...?

column3: After Hard Ass exits the Miner's House, and as he is looking for the Boss's house.
column4: La casa de l'Amo no deu ser gaire lluny.
column6: The Boss's house must be around here somewhere.

column3: Hard Ass enters the house of Miner Jenny.
column4: Un ruc? Com has arribat fins aquí des de la Mina?
column6: A donkey? How'd you get here from the Mines?

column4: Soc jo! La Jennifer. Del torn de nit.
column6: It's me! Jenny. From the night shift.

column4: Salta les flames i agafa el meu Ordinador!
column6: Run into the flames and grab my Computer!

column4: Què passa? Que les teves orellotes de burro no et deixen sentir-me?
column6: What, you can't hear me with those big dumb donkey ears?

column3: A screen wipe (transition), Hard Ass has to fight Miner Jenny.
column6: Fine, I'll MAKE YOU DO IT!

column3: After killing Miner Jenny in battle.

column4: Els Humans no es mereixen la nostra feina.
column6: The Humans don't deserve our labour.

column4: Així que hem arribat fins aquí.
column6: So, it has come to this.

column4: Aquesta Màquina tenia més valor per a ella que la meva vida?
column6: That Machine is more valuable to her than my life?

column4: Després de tants anys treballant colze a colze a la Mina...
column6: After all those years working side by side in the Mine...

column4: Perquè no he volgut salvar la seva Màquina Computadora.
column6: Because I wouldn't save her Computer-Machine.

column4: De cap manera, si no ens tracten com a iguals.
column6: Not when they don't see us as equals.

column3: Hard Ass can now leave the house.
column4: S'ha acabat la Manifestació—és hora de començar la Revolució.
column6: No more Protests—it's time for Revolution.

column4: Uix. Sempre he sabut que eres una bèstia estúpida.
column6: Ugh. I always knew you were a dumb beast.

column4: El meu Ordinador val per MIL RUCS!
column6: My Computer is worth a THOUSAND DONKEYS!

column4: Et juro per Déu que ET FARÉ MIQUES!!
column6: So help me God, I will END YOU!!

column3: Enemy dialogue. Jenny is close to death.
column6: Is this... game over for me?

column4: La Minera Jennifer utilitza LLANÇAMENT DE CARBÓ.
La Minera Jennifer utilitza COP DE CASC.
Utilitzes Grunyit. La Minera Jennifer s'enfada.
column6: You Grunt. Miner Jenny becomes angry.

column4: Utilitzes Bram. La Minera Jennifer fa cara de confusa.
column6: You Bray. Miner Jenny is confused.

column3: Hard stands in front of a painting of a donkey and a prophet.
Hard Ass enters Mr. Butte's house from the bottom floor.
column4: Sento alguna cosa al pis de dalt.

column3: Upon heading upstairs, Hard Ass finds Mr. Butte, who is drunk.

column4: Soc jo, el Sr. Roca. L'Amo.
column6: It's me, Mr. Butte. The Boss.

column4: Ai... Suposo que reemplaçar-vos per Màquines no va servir de res.
column6: *sigh* I guess replacing you donkeys made no difference.

column4: Però els negocis són els negocis, saps?
column6: But business is business, you know?

column4: Noves Màquines per una nova era.
column6: New Machines for a new era.

column4: No pots explotar una Mina de Carbó només amb rucs—som al segle XXI!
column6: You can't run a Coal Mine with just donkeys—it's the 21st century!

column4: El món crema i Déu m'envia un Ase enlloc d'un Àngel.
column6: The world is burning and God sends me an Ass instead of an Angel.

column4: Ah, què collons. Mira'm. Ja torno a parlar amb un ruc...
column6: Ah, what the hell. Look at me. Talking to a donkey again...

column4: No m'estranya que la Gemma em deixés...

column3: Screen wipe (transition) to a battle between Mr. Butte and Hard Ass.
If Hard Ass attempts to leave.
After killing Mr. Butte in the battle. Hard Ass stands in Mr. Butte's house, everything is on fire.
Hard Ass can try to leave now.
column4: Un món on els Ases són el seu propi Amo...
column6: A world where Asses are their own Masters...

column3: As Hard Ass attempts to leave, the door caves in.

column4: He de tornar amb el Ramat.
column6: I have to get back to the Herd.

column3: The roof collapses on Hard Ass.

column6: Mr. Butte stares at you confused.

column3: Enemy dialogue. If Butte's health is less than 40%.
column6: Why are you hurting me?\nI don't understand!

column3: Enemy dialogue. Butte is about to die.

column4: Només mirava de guanyar diners!\nHo has d'entendre!
column6: I was just trying to make money!\nYou gotta understand!

column3: Nice Ass arrives at the Outhouse.

column4: Tristase! Deixa d'amagar-te a la Comuna!
column6: Sad Ass! Quit hiding in the outhouse!

column4: No tinc forces per moure'm... Estic tan sol...
column6: I don't have it in me to move... I'm all alone...

column4: Aix, Camarada, no és veritat! Estem tots amb tu. No estàs sol!
column6: Gee Comrade, that's not true! All of us care about you. We're here for ya!

column4: Va, Camarada, hem de sortir d'aquí!
column6: C'mon Comrade, we have to go now!

column4: Va, Camarada, hem de sortir d'aquí!
column6: C'mon Comrade, we have to go now!

column4: No tenim temps per a això, Tristase! Pel que més vulguis!
column6: Sad Ass, now is not the time for this, please!

column4: Etziba una coça a la porta
Soc un monstre... Una bèstia inútil...
column6: I'm a monster... A worthless beast...

column4: Em passo el dia sense fer res...
column6: I spend my days doing nothing...

column4: Només recreant-me en el meu dolor...
Jo... Jo no volia que se n'anés tot de mare...
column6: I-I didn't mean for things to get this out of control...

column4: No és veritat... Estic tan prim que se'm veuen les costelles sota el pelatge.
column6: You're lying... I'm so skinny you can see my ribs through my fur...

column4: Estic exhaust... Amb prou feines he pogut tornar...
column6: I'm so tired... I barely made it back...

column4: Mira, no sé de què parles—
column6: Listen, I don't know what you're talking about—

column4: Algú ha pres mal a l'incendi...?
column6: Has anyone been hurt in the fire...?

column4: Digue-li que l'Honradase ha mort en caure dins del pou.
column6: Tell him Trusty Ass died falling down the well.

column4: L'Honradase ha caigut dins del pou mirant de treure'n aigua... i ha mort.
column6: Trusty Ass fell down the well trying to get water...and died.

column4: Estan atrapats a casa seva, cremant vius.
column6: They're trapped inside their homes burning alive.

column4: Estan atrapats a casa seva, cremant vius.
column6: They're trapped inside their homes burning alive.

column4: Els altres estan rescatant els Humans ara mateix.
column6: The others are rescuing the Humans as we speak.

column4: Estic segura que els altres estan rescatant els Humans ara mateix.
column6: I'm sure the others are rescuing the Humans as we speak.
I was just trying to help...

column4: Només volia destruir una de les Màquines Rodadores dels Humans, no calar-li foc a tot!
column6: I only meant to destroy one of the Humans' ugly Car-Machines, not set everything ablaze!!

column4: Qualsevol pot tenir un accident, podem solucionar-ho!
column6: Accidents happen all the time, we can fix this!

column4: Qualsevol pot tenir un accident, podem solucionar-ho!
column6: Accidents happen all the time, we can fix this!

column4: Et prometo que podem! Però càsum dena, vine amb mi ara mateix!
column6: I promise we can! But by golly you have to come with me now!

column4: La Granja—casa nostra! Tristase, com has pogut?!
column6: The Farm—our home! Sad Ass, how could you?!

column4: No formo part de la Granja...
column6: I don't belong on this Farm...

column4: Tinc el cor enterrat sota tones de carbó...
column6: My heart is buried under layers of coal...

column4: Per què la vida és tan dolorosa?
column6: Is life supposed to be so full of pain?

column4: Reposa el cap a la porta en silenci.
column6: Lean your head against the door in silence.

column4: Contempla com es crema la Granja.
column6: Look back at the Farm as it burns.

column4: Digue'm la veritat... Recordes de quin color eren els ulls de la Perase?
column6: Tell me the truth... Do you remember the colour of Lazy's beautiful eyes?

column3: If the Player chooses the wrong eye colour.

column4: No, espera! Sí que me'n recordo!\nEren:
column6: No wait! I remember! They were:

column3: If the Player chooses the correct eye colour.

column4: Vatua l'olla, és clar que sí!
Bellase, jo no volia que passés això...
column6: Nice Ass, I never meant for this to happen...

column4: Si us plau, em promets mantenir el secret entre tu i jo...?
column6: Please, promise me you'll keep this secret between you and me...?

column4: Guardaré el secret fins al dia que em mori.
column6: I'll keep your secret for the rest of my life.

column4: Ho sento molt, ja no podràs llaurar aquests camps...
column6: I'm sorry, you won't be able to plow these fields anymore...

column4: Benvinguts a la Granja de Talldevall. A l'oest, el remarcable Estable Històric i els nostres camps de blat.
column6: Welcome to Fannyside Farm. To the west, our beautiful Heritage Stable and wheat fields.
Welcome to Fannyside Farm. To the west, our beautiful Heritage Stable and wheat fields.

column4: Al sud-oest, el Molí i el Graner d'Última Generació.
column6: To the southwest, our state of the art Mill and Granary.
To the southwest, our state of the art Mill and Granary.

column4: NOVA Autopista Boncul: Connectant els Nuclis Rurals i la Ciutat
column6: NEW Government Sponsored Highway—Connecting Urban and Rural Communities
NEW Government Sponsored Highway—Connecting Urban and Rural Communities
Old Mountain Trail to the City
Old Mountain Trail to the City
The State of the Art Mill and Granary
The State of the Art Mill and Granary

column3: Nice Ass consoles Sad Ass as the rain starts to put out the fire.
column4: Tristase, la pluja és un senyal que podem tornar a començar!
column6: Sad Ass, this rain is a sign that we can start again!

column4: Farem el que sabem fer millor—avançarem pas a pas, a poc a poc.
column6: We'll do what we do best—move forward one little step at a time.

column4: Per més pedregós que sigui el camí.
column6: No matter how uneven the ground.

column4: Estic convençuda que els nostres Camarades han pogut salvar els Humans.
column6: I'm sure our Comrades have saved the Humans.

column4: I que els Humans han sortit al carrer a celebrar-ho.
column6: And the Humans are in the streets cheering.

column4: Canten amb totes les seves forces i ballen, bojos d'alegria!
column6: They are singing their hearts out and dancing their butts off!

column4: Cada any faran una de les seves festes per commemorar aquest dia!
column6: They will make today one of their annual holidays.

column4: Erigiran estàtues d'or als heroics Ases i s'hi aplegaran per homenatjar-nos!
column6: They will erect golden statues of heroic Asses and gather to commemorate us.

column4: Redena, n'hi haurà una fins i tot per a la Perase!
column6: Gosh, even one for Lazy Ass!

column4: Desballestaran totes les Mâquines i se'n desfaran per sempre.
column6: They will break down their Machines and throw them away.

column4: I els Humans mai més pensaran que som inútils.
column6: And Humans will never call us worthless again.
YUPPERS, WE'RE GOING BACK TO WORK!
